title: Deep Learning–Enhanced Automated Visual Inspection for SHM
summary: Develop AI pipeline for crack detection/quantification on civil structures; integrate with inspection workflows.

title: AI‑Based Concrete Elasticity via DIC
summary: Estimate elastic properties from DIC on cylinders/beams using physics‑informed ML.

title: PTF‑Concrete: Short Palm Frond Fibers in Concrete
summary: Investigate sustainable natural fibers (PTF) for improved concrete properties and durability.

title: FBG‑Based Strain Sensing for Bridges
summary: Compare FBG strain measurements vs. strain gauges under static/dynamic loads for bridge monitoring.

title: Dynamic p–y Curves for SSI
summary: Develop dynamic p–y formulations for piles under seismic loading; validate vs. literature and tests.
